message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $12,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  That's still a fair price considering the value of the product to you, and it gives us both a good outcome. Let me know what you think!
